msg: Fix bugzilla 22268 - Admin truncates user password in 32 characters.

author: markt
msg: - Don't remove application parameters on stop (only the parameters specified in web.xml would get added back).

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 15572. Ensure the catalina.useNaming property is set before executing the digester so the -nonaming command line option has an effect. Patch provided by Gary Benson.

author: markt
msg: Provide an implementation for getName() and getPassword(). Found this whilst trying to use CLIENT-CERT authentication with the Sun web services developement kit.

author: markt
msg: Fix bug 27190. Ensure webdav servlet returns correct status in response to MOVE request.
